mapper.select: select * from productorder where order_mem_num=#{mem_num} and order_sta=1 order by order_num desc limit #{pvo.pageStart},#{pvo.qty};
select count(order_num) from productorder where order_mem_num=#{mem_num};
select count(order_num) from productorder where order_mem_num=#{mem_num} and order_sta=1;
select book_num, book_price,book_title from book where book_num = #{book_num}
mapper.insert: insert into productorder(order_num,order_date, addressee, order_mem_num,order_add1, order_add2,order_sta, deliveryCost, order_usePoint) values(#{order_num},#{order_date},#{addressee}, #{order_mem_num},#{order_add1}, #{order_add2}, '배송준비', #{deliveryCost}, #{usePoint})
insert into OrderItem(order_num, book_num, bookCount, book_price, savePoint,book_name) values(#{order_num}, #{book_num}, #{bookCount}, #{book_price}, #{savePoint},#{book_name})
mapper.update: update member set mem_cash = #{mem_cash}, mem_point = #{mem_point} where mem_num = #{mem_num}
update book set book_count = #{book_count}, book_sales = #{book_sales} where book_num = #{book_num}
update productorder set order_sta = '구매완료' where order_num = #{order_num}
update productorder set order_sta = '배송중' where order_mem_num = #{mem_num} and order_date < #{order_date} and order_sta != '구매완료'
